html:
4.22.21  5:28 pm   what is your opinion on dirt

      the flavor overwhelms me

4.22.21  4:58 pm   Why does the note B# exist?

      if you are on paper, and you don't want to have to keep unsharping and re-sharping the C. that note in the scale can safely live on the B line for today, and its neighbors will not normally bother it

4.22.21  4:48 pm   Is this like a "Ask Bill Wurtz"page?

     yes

     If it's not, then why is this here-?

4.22.21  4:41 pm   what is your opinion on pineapple on pizza?

      pineapple is pizza

4.22.21  4:39 pm   got some money is one of your few music videos where you don't show your face.

     there's more than a few

      is this a reference to faceless corporations that have lots of money?

      no

4.22.21  3:16 pm   Do you like your music?

      i try to make it how i like it. whether or not i've ever succeeded at that is anyone's guess

4.22.21  2:15 pm   is your next song about trees?

      i don't think so

4.22.21  1:41 pm   Why does creation take more time than destruction

      it depends how high your standards are

4.22.21  1:33 pm   The Easter Bunny told me that you're Santa in disguise. Is this true?

      no

4.22.21  1:10 pm   thoughts on computers

      moral compass so strong you can't even tell which direction it's pointing
4.22.21  1:04 pm   Can you reply to this question with one capitalized letter?

4.22.21  12:45 pm   What's the best part of making a video? 

      the part where you get to think of something and then make it appear in someone else's mind

4.22.21  12:21 pm   i've noticed how most your songs have all these side melodies and things that come in once in a while (like the bass) to emphasize certain parts, how do you know which parts to emphasize and when to use certain melodies? do you just use the time you're not singing to utilize these melodies?

      i just have to try it and see. it generally tends to be a good strategy to not have too many different things happening at exactly the same time. sort of like in conversation. but sometimes some overlap does work. you just have to try and see

4.22.21  11:46 am   Why do you think moon is big?

      to block out the sun, if necessary

4.22.21  11:38 am   do u like satan

      i don't know anyone named satan

4.22.21  11:20 am   how long does a video take?

      just the right amount of time

4.22.21  10:24 am   1.21.21  6:26 pm -> So, did you succeed to end up at 3 audio and instruments tracks for got some money ? Or 30 ? If no, how many tracks have this song session ?

      about 296

4.22.21  10:22 am   What are your thoughts on thoughts?

      it's like another world, in your mind

4.22.21  10:04 am   A duck has trapped me in my house.

     i believe you

      What should I do?

      take a video of it and upload it and call it "duck traps person in house"

4.22.21  9:00 am   are your videos inspired by LSD?

      no. i'm not entirely sure what that is

4.22.21  8:56 am   What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?

      is that the african or european swallow

4.22.21  8:17 am   do you ever feel like you release songs in the wrong order?

      yes

4.22.21  7:42 am   if everything is possible doesnt that mean that nothing is possible?

      no

4.22.21  7:14 am   What's your thoughts on the moon?

      'wow what an empty place' .... 'the days feel like months'

4.22.21  6:56 am   i've been searching dumpsters for 2 months now and i can't find ur song, any advice?

      check spotify

4.22.21  5:27 am   is the next song about ice-cream?

      i doubt it

4.22.21  5:02 am   Whenever I try to write a melody, it oftens morphs into something I've heard before. Any tips for avoiding this?

      you could do a sort of 'fake-out'. like you may have seen in sports

4.22.21  3:54 am   Is 'got some money' actually a commubist propaganda designed to let peopel know that money is really useless and its ruining our lives

     no

     If not, what is it?

     music

4.22.21  2:27 am   Bill, I want to make music but I don't know where to start. I can play the piano, trumpet, and a bit of guitar but you're the only person who has really inspired me. What is your advice? Thanks for your inspiration!

      do you feel compelled to use words in your work? that's just one of about a million questions i'd want to ask to help determine a course of action

4.22.21  2:08 am   serious question, how much do you like writing music?

      enough to make me a bit of a basket case

4.22.21  1:10 am   At 1:18 and 1:34 in i'm a princess, the aspect ratio shrinks a little and on the left side it looks like it says "EXIT" in green very faintly, was this on purpose?

      just a lucky coincidence i suppose that doesn't particularly make sense to me

4.22.21  12:23 am   is there a benefit to having a keyboard shortcut for keysmashing, compared to an actual keysmash?

      it will be slightly quicker and it will be easier to avoid ever doing it exactly the same way, or having to deliberately try to make it different than you've ever done it before. basically it eliminates any mental energy you'd have to spend on it

4.22.21  12:02 am   are we in a simulation?

      of what

4.21.21  11:10 pm   If the got some money video was finished on April 14th, why did you wait until the 19th to release it?

      because i was afraid it sucked

4.21.21  10:53 pm   why do your songs always sound so different from your other songs

      to disprove the nay sayers

4.21.21  10:36 pm   How do you avoid trying to make all your songs perfect and trying for 600 years on each of them?

      have you considered going into panic mode

4.21.21  10:31 pm   What's your inspiration for making music?

      the world

4.21.21  10:19 pm   is the line "it's time for the show" in the new song a reference to the improv "the show" from 2012?

      perhaps the "said it 3 or 4 songs ago" part makes it a reference

4.21.21  10:08 pm   what got you into music

      music

4.21.21  9:44 pm   When you write and produce music, how much are you already thinking of the video ideas?

     maybe about 20%

     Do you think things like "this noise is for blinking traffic lights, this riff is for types of trees",

     in both of those cases, no

      or do you come up with the ideas for the video after the song is done?

      in those cases, yes

4.21.21  9:43 pm   When is your face reveal

      never

4.21.21  9:27 pm   for some reason, my favorite song of yours is always the newest one. it's not that I like there being new song, it's just that I find each song better than the last. do you try to make each better than the last one?

     yes

     or is that just like a fluke or something?

      fluke is my real name. Flucas

4.21.21  7:24 pm   I had a dream I wrote a piece of music, and I heard the music, but I don't remember it anymore now that I'm awake, and I'm just left feeling weird and kinda sad that dream me is better at music-ing than real me.

     that's understandable. being awake can be quite a hinderance to writing

     How do you remember the music in your dreams?

     write it down and/or sing it and describe it into a recording as fast as you can

     Do you always?

     sometimes i can't catch it all

     Or do I just have to move on and hope to come across a new song while conscious?

     you should do that too, because dream ideas can be rare. What you can do, when working while you're awake, is just be patient, and know that sometimes nothing happens for a long time until you can finally get truly comfortable. in a way, it only works if you stop wanting it to work. And this can be quite difficult, especially if you want the music as much as i do. but if you're patient, it HAS to happen eventually. science tells us this

4.21.21  7:18 pm   why did you reupload "Money" on Spotify?

      i only uploaded it 1 time

4.21.21  6:57 pm   Probably have been asked this before, but did you study music professionally/at a college level?

     no, but, i've always had an extremely professional attitude in all of my personal lifelong music research/studies/experimentation, and i take it extremely seriously

     If so did you specify in any genres?

     normal

4.21.21  6:27 pm   did you intentionally make "happy birthday to me" the most distinctive minor chord in got some money?

      it's part of a broader intention to use all the melody/chords/lyrics that i intended

4.21.21  6:23 pm   are video games just a video of the game?

      no, that's game videos

4.21.21  6:22 pm   what's your mbti type?

      Mild, Bold, Tries things, Isn't a villain

4.21.21  6:11 pm   What was the most challenging part of learning 3D stuff?

      the parts i haven't learned yet

4.21.21  5:22 pm   Why do you like to use lowercase letters

      because they are normal, but, i was going to ask you the same question
